Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie was decent produced though.
That being said, as a viewer I was still taken by this classic Disney film when I rewatched it lately: I think one can’t be fair to ‘old‘ films if you don’t put them in their contemporary context.
